submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:

        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)

        l,r = 0,0
        re = 0
        m,n = m-1,n-1
        while l<m or r<n:
            consume_max = 0
            if l<m and r<n:
                if horizontalCut[l]>verticalCut[r]:
                    consume_max = horizontalCut[l]
                    l+=1
                    re += consume_max*(r+1)
                else:
                    consume_max = verticalCut[r]
                    r+=1
                    re += consume_max*(l+1)


            elif l<m:
                consume_max = horizontalCut[l]
                l+=1
                re += consume_max*(r+1)

            else:
                consume_max = verticalCut[r]
                r+=1
                re += consume_max*(l+1)

        return re
